org.cloudifysource.esc.installer.remoteExec
Interface RemoteExecutor

All Known Implementing Classes:
NewSshExecutor, SshExecutor, WinrmExecutor
public interface RemoteExecutor

An interface for remote command execution used to launch a cloudify agent on a remote machine.

Since:
2.5.0
Author:
barakme

Method Summary
 void execute(String targetHost, InstallationDetails details, String command, long endTimeMillis)
          Executes a command on the remote host.
 void initialize(AgentlessInstaller installer, InstallationDetails details)
          Initializes the remote executor.
 

Method Detail

execute

void execute(String targetHost,
             InstallationDetails details,
             String command,
             long endTimeMillis)
             throws InstallerException,
                    TimeoutException,
                    InterruptedException
Executes a command on the remote host.

Parameters:
targetHost - the target host where the command will be executed.
details - the details of the installation request, including details of the remote host.
command - the command to execute.
endTimeMillis - end time by which the command must finish.
Throws:
InstallerException - if the command failed or could not be executed.
TimeoutException - if the timeout expired.
InterruptedException - in the request was interrupted while waiting on the network.

initialize

void initialize(AgentlessInstaller installer,
                InstallationDetails details)
Initializes the remote executor. This method is called once, before the execute request is issued.

Parameters:
installer - The agentless installer that invoked this remote executor.
details - the details of the installation request.
